messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of casting the 'ping of Gorgoroth' spell?
6+ magic points; 5 POW; 2D6 Sanity points
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does the 'ping of Gorgoroth' spell take to cast?
1D6+4 minutes
You are a helpful assistant.
Can the caster change their physical form into anything they want?
The sorcerer can change to any shape and appearance, though retaining personal abilities.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can the caster take on a form that is not known to them?
No, the caster can take on only a known form.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the primary condition for casting this spell?
The caster can take on only a known form.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the total magic points required to cast this spell?
6 magic points and an additional magic point for each 5 points of SIZ to be gained or lost in the body warping.
You are a helpful assistant.
What effect is the alteration caused by this spell?
The effect is permanent until the spell is recast to change back again.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required to undo the warping effect of this spell?
A simple verbal phrase is all that is required.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the permanent effect of the spell 'The Black Pharaoh’s Touch'?
Only one alteration per casting is possible and the effect is permanent until the spell is recast to change back again.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can the spell 'The Black Pharaoh’s Touch' be cast on another being?
This spell cannot be cast on another being.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required to undo the warping caused by 'The Black Pharaoh’s Touch'?
A simple verbal phrase is all that is required.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a characteristic of the 'Brew Space-Mead' described in the text?
Its bouquet and its taste…outdid even the oldest Chianti and the best Chateau Yquem to such an extent that…
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the spell's effect on the caster when imitating an individual?
The caster becomes a replica of that person, including voice and speech patterns.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the required verbal phrase to undo the warping when imitating an individual?
A simple verbal phrase is all that is required.
You are a helpful assistant.
How many magic points are required per dose for the spell?
20 magic points per dose
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum amount of Magic and Sanity points required for the spell?
Variable additional Magic and Sanity points
You are a helpful assistant.
What allows a human to withstand journeys through space?
space-mead
You are a helpful assistant.
How many magic points are sacrificed per dose of space-mead?
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does brewing space-mead require?
at least a week
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of casting Breath of the Deep?
8 magic points; 1D6 Sanity points
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the five special ingredients required to brew space-mead?
Brewing space-mead requires five special ingredients to be chosen by the Keeper and requires at least a week of brewing time.
You are a helpful assistant.
How many magic points does the caster sacrifice per dose into the brew?
The caster must sacrifice 20 magic points per dose into the brew.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of casting Breath of the Deep?
The cost of casting Breath of the Deep is 8 magic points.

What happens to the target if the caster wins the opposed POW roll?
If the caster wins the target begins to drown—the target falls to the floor, choking.
